title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Develop a comprehensive list of project requirements, detailing the range of supported pet species, the diverse vocalizations and behaviors to be interpreted for each species, the desired user-friendly mobile app interface, and the integration with additional features such as pet health monitoring and community sharing. Additionally, establish performance benchmarks, privacy policies, and security measures.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Develop the overall system architecture, including the components for data collection, processing, and translation, as well as the mobile app interface.

title: Set up Development Environment
description: Configure the development environment, including the necessary tools, frameworks, and libraries for the project.

title: Develop Data Collection and Processing Components
description: Implement the components responsible for collecting and processing pet vocalizations and behavior data.

title: Develop Translation and Interpretation Components
description: Implement the components responsible for translating and interpreting the collected data into human-understandable messages.

title: Develop Mobile App Frontend
description: Design and implement the user interface and functionality of the mobile app for displaying the translated pet messages.

title: Integrate System Components
description: Integrate the data collection, processing, translation, and mobile app components into a cohesive system.
dependencies: Develop Data Collection and Processing Components

title: Conduct System Testing
description: Perform comprehensive testing of the integrated system, including functional, performance, and usability testing.

title: Address Security Concerns
description: Identify and mitigate potential security risks in the system, ensuring the protection of user data and system integrity.

title: Prepare Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and maintenance instructions.

title: Deploy and Release
description: Deploy the system to production environments and release the mobile app to app stores.
